name: RentScouter
overview:
RentScouter helps everyone find the best price whether they are buying a textbook for college or looking for a new favorite read.

The site scours the internet to find the best price for any book and shows a price comparison between new, used, rental and ebook formats. It also contains information about each company including user reviews and BBB ratings to help users make informed buying decisions. Users can also use the price comparison when selling back a book for cash to compare what their local bookstore might be offering.
